column1: Local Foods////I really wanted to give a this place a lower star..... But
column2: fine. Hippies and granola unite!  The name deterred me but the food
column3: atmosphere and location will bring me back. As stated in my tip
column4: they offered us their signature drink which was AHmazing
column6: but I am certainly suckered into buying it next time. I had the crunchy chicken sandwich and my wife had the Asian salad and both were very good
column7: fresh and relatively inexpensive.  We we t at a random time so service was fast but I can imagine this place being packed during regular lunch hours.
